title: Milton Friedman on Money
description: Russ Roberts talks with Milton Friedman about his research and views on inflation, the Federal Reserve, Alan Greenspan and Ben Bernanke, and what the future holds.
author: webmaster@econlib.org (Library of Economics and Liberty)
